Class GMRES

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.matrices.solvers.sparse.GMRES
public class GMRES extends Object
GMRES (Generalized Minimal Residual) solver.

Solves Ax = b for general non-symmetric matrices. Uses Arnoldi iteration to build Krylov subspace. Memory efficient for large sparse systems.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • solve

      public static Real[] solve(Matrix<Real> A, Real[] b, Real[] x0, Real tolerance, int maxIterations, int restarts)
      Solves Ax = b using GMRES with restarts.
      Parameters:
      A - matrix (can be non-symmetric)
      b - right-hand side
      x0 - initial guess
      tolerance - convergence tolerance
      maxIterations - max iterations per restart
      restarts - number of restarts
      Returns:
      approximate solution
